dataList.content: <style="DEN_CP9_1">Once something cannot be remembered anymore, its time is as good as lost.
<style="DEN_CP9_1">When will you come back? Will you be back tomorrow? Will you ever return?
<style="DEN_CP9_1">I trusted you. Day and night I waited, hanging onto your promise.
<style="DEN_CP9_1">The resentment of that day keeps echoing back, no matter how many times I slashed at them...
<style="DEN_CP9_1">... Not yet. I do not wish... to return yet.
